data.name: Blue Fish Yokohama
data.detailed_description:
Blue Fish Yokohama is a relaxing tile-based puzzle game where all the ramen is deliciously eaten by our protagonist... a fish!?!!?!?!!

+ Simple controls that you will pick up instantly



+ Discover new and exciting game mechanics as the levels progress.



+ Solve & explore 50 handcrafted levels in beautiful and colorful voxel art.



Eat the ramen, save the world.

You'll receive the full game with the 50 levels plus loads of karma points for supporting independent & small-scale developers.

data.short_description: Blue Fish Yokohama is a relaxing tile-based puzzle game. You are a fish that eats miso ramen, cheese ramen and tantanmen by jumping, bumping, bouncing and splashing through a Japanese restaurant. Solve 50 handcrafted levels with unique game mechanics.
data.supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Arabic, Bulgarian, Czech, Danish, Dutch, Finnish, Greek, Hungarian, Japanese, Korean, Norwegian, Polish, Portuguese, Portuguese - Brazil, Romanian, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Spanish - Latin America, Swedish, Thai, Traditional Chinese, Turkish, Ukrainian, Vietnamese

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7+
  • Processor: 1.5 GHz or more
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Any graphics card capable of DirectX10 or more
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 200 MB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: MAC OS X 10+
  • Processor: 1.5 GHz or more
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Storage: 200 MB available space

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 10.10+
  • Processor: 1.5 GHz or more
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
